Open_ModLibrary_Tooltip: Open the ModLibrary directory in Explorer
SettingsPage_OptimizePreviews_Tooltip: Resizes preview images to 1000x1000 pixels, crops non-square images to square (middle), saves as high-quality JPG. Also creates small mini-tiles.
SettingsPage_ModGridZoom_Tooltip: Feature is half-bugged. Mouse scroll wheel may stop working, dragging scroll bar or using mouse wheel on scroll bar still works. That's WinUI 3 problem, couldn't fix this.
OptimizePreviews_Confirm_Message: This will optimize all mod preview images to 1000x1000 pixels. This process may take some time. Do you want to continue?
Ntfs_Warning_Content: The selected folder for {0} ({1}) is not on an NTFS partition. This will prevent mod activation (symlinks).
Ntfs_Startup_Warning_Content: Mod management works on all file systems supported by Windows. However, the current disk or partition is not formatted as NTFS, which prevents the creation of symbolic links (symlinks) and thus mod activation. You can still select a mod library and XXMI target folder on an NTFS disk to enable mod activation.
XXMI_Download_Required: XXMI Launcher is required to launch mods. Download the portable version from GitHub:
XXMI_Download_Instructions: After downloading, extract the XXMI folder to APP direvtory or update the XXMI Mods Directory path in Settings.
Delete_Mod_Confirm_Message: Are you sure you want to delete the mod '{0}'? This will move the mod folder to the Recycle Bin.
OptimizePreviews_Description: Preview image optimization means the image will be cropped to a 1:1 ratio from the center and resized to 1000x1000 px.
